start_sources()
# -- lz4.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"../../SDKs/lz4/lib/lz4.c"
		"../../SDKs/lz4/lib/lz4.h"
		"../../SDKs/lz4/lib/lz4frame.c"

		"../../SDKs/lz4/lib/xxhash.h"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEngineStaticModule(lz4 SOLUTION_FOLDER "Libs")
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} INTERFACE "${SDK_DIR}/lz4/lib" )
